data.text: Sometime before the upcoming Selection Race――
data.processed: 󠁿Sometime before the upcoming Selection Race――

data.text: ……Huuu, self-assessment finished.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……Huuu, self-assessment finished.

data.text:
If I can keep it up like this, I might get a recommendation to a sports 
university. That's how it feels. It should be enough to meet expectations~
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿If I can keep it up like this, I might get a recommendation to a sports 
󠁿university. That's how it feels. It should be enough to meet expectations~

data.text:
Right, right. If I study like this, get in to a sports university, 
and work at a sports-related company, I can have a stable life.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Right, right. If I study like this, get in to a sports university, 
󠁿and work at a sports-related company, I can have a stable life.

data.text:
Even if I choose this route, I think even the people back 
home would praise me. I mean, it's still a commendable future, right?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Even if I choose this route, I think even the people back 
󠁿home would praise me. I mean, it's still a commendable future, right?

data.text:
But, if I choose to debut in the Twinkle Series…… 
once I go there, there will be no turning back.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿But, if I choose to debut in the Twinkle Series…… 
󠁿once I go there, there will be no turning back.

data.text:
From then on I'll be in the world of 『Serious Uma Musume』, won't I? 
Dedicating their entire life to racing…… remarkable girls.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿From then on I'll be in the world of 『Serious Uma Musume』, won't I? 
󠁿Dedicating their entire life to racing…… remarkable girls.

data.text:
I don't really have the resolve to dedicate 
my life to racing. Not at all.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿I don't really have the resolve to dedicate 
󠁿my life to racing. Not at all.

data.text:
But earlier, when I was competing with Top Road-chan…… when it seemed 
like a close match, I started to think maaaay~be I can do it too.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿But earlier, when I was competing with Top Road-chan…… when it seemed 
󠁿like a close match, I started to think maaaay~be I can do it too.

data.text:
Because of that I'm just a liiiiiii~ttle bit concerned. 
Wondering what I should do. From now on.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Because of that I'm just a liiiiiii~ttle bit concerned. 
󠁿Wondering what I should do. From now on.

data.text:
Well, I guess~……if it seemed like I'd do well I thought 
it'd be okay. Do my best, run, and being happy would be nice.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Well, I guess~……if it seemed like I'd do well I thought 
󠁿it'd be okay. Do my best, run, and being happy would be nice.

data.text: Ah~……
data.name: Hishi Miracle

data.text: ……………Yeah. ……Ehehe.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……………Yeah. ……Ehehe.

data.text: Ueeh?
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: From now on, always, more than anyone else
choices.processed: <size=37>From now on, always, more than anyone else</size>

data.processed: 󠁿Ueeh?

data.text: O-oooooh……um, well~……
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Expectations, and I want to believe

data.processed: 󠁿O-oooooh……um, well~……

data.text:
Y-you'd go that far, huh~…… 
Ah~, Waa~, Oooh~, fine I get it……!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Y-you'd go that far, huh~…… 
󠁿Ah~, Waa~, Oooh~, fine I get it……!

data.text: ……I'll do my best…… in the Selection Race!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……I'll do my best…… in the Selection Race!

data.text: ――Finally, the day of the Selection Race was here.
data.processed: 󠁿――Finally, the day of the Selection Race was here.

data.text: (Today too, Trainer-san was planning to give me signals……)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(Today too, Trainer-san was planning to give me signals……)

data.text: (But that's too early……! We just started!)
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: You can do it! Promising Newcomer!

data.processed: 󠁿(But that's too early……! We just started!)

data.text:
(Oooh~, there it is……! Like I thought, 
it's really embarrassing~! But――)
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: You can win! You're the best!
You can win! You're the best!

data.processed:
󠁿(Oooh~, there it is……! Like I thought, 
󠁿it's really embarrassing~! But――)

data.text: (I guess it's raising my motivation!)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(I guess it's raising my motivation!)

data.text:
Isn't Mirako a little different today? 
She seems a little different from that training earlier……
data.name: Cheerful Uma Musume
data.processed:
󠁿Isn't Mirako a little different today? 
󠁿She seems a little different from that training earlier……

data.text: Yeah…… you're right. But…… but you know――
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah…… you're right. But…… but you know――

data.text: Haa…… Haa……!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿Haa…… Haa……!

data.text: ――Today's Mirako is cool.
data.name: Cynical Uma Musume
data.processed: 󠁿――Today's Mirako is cool.

data.text: (Why am I so desperate? Did I always like running this much?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(Why am I so desperate? Did I always like running this much?)

data.text:
(If I win this, I'm going to debut, huh? 
Training to be a pro is gonna be tough, isn't it?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(If I win this, I'm going to debut, huh? 
󠁿Training to be a pro is gonna be tough, isn't it?)

data.text:
(I won't be able to go back, after this, huh? 
Staying up all night reading manga, I won't be able to 
do things like that anymore, right?)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(I won't be able to go back, after this, huh? 
󠁿Staying up all night reading manga, I won't be able to 
󠁿do things like that anymore, right?)

data.text: (That person, I wonder why they're that desperate――)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(That person, I wonder why they're that desperate――)

data.text: (……Ahh-, for me)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(……Ahh-, for me)

data.text: I guess it's because they have expectations for me, huh……!!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿I guess it's because they have expectations for me, huh……!!

data.text:
(……I guess I don't need to think about it too 
hard, huh? After all, I'm happy right now)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(……I guess I don't need to think about it too 
󠁿hard, huh? After all, I'm happy right now)

data.text:
(So I can live up to that person's expectations, 
I guess…… I'll try to work a little harder!)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(So I can live up to that person's expectations, 
󠁿I guess…… I'll try to work a little harder!)

data.text:
Hishi Miracle took first! I hurriedly rushed through 
the crowd of people in awe at the surprise victory.

choices.text: With this…… we can form a contract!!
With this…… we can form a contract!!

data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle took first! I hurriedly rushed through 
󠁿the crowd of people in awe at the surprise victory.

data.text:
……Fu. Fufufu…… Ahaha! You don't have to be 
in such a hurry, I'm not going to run away.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……Fu. Fufufu…… Ahaha! You don't have to be 
󠁿in such a hurry, I'm not going to run away.

data.text:
……Well, Trainer-san. You see, 
I don't really think I can devote my life to racing.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……Well, Trainer-san. You see, 
󠁿I don't really think I can devote my life to racing.

data.text:
That's why, I'll do my best just to 『Live up to those expectations』. 
……Are you still okay with that?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I'll do my best just to 『Live up to those expectations』. 
󠁿……Are you still okay with that?

data.text:
So that I can keep running, always~
……keep those expectations coming.
data.name: Hishi Miracle

choices.text: Of course. We're gonna win G1s!

data.processed:
󠁿So that I can keep running, always~
󠁿……keep those expectations coming.

data.text:
Ahaha, that might be getting a little ahead of ourselves~. 
Something like that, we'd probably need a miracle――
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha, that might be getting a little ahead of ourselves~. 
󠁿Something like that, we'd probably need a miracle――

data.text: ……you sure know what to say.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……you sure know what to say.

data.text:
(Aaah~, I'm just getting swept up in the moment. 
But――)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿(Aaah~, I'm just getting swept up in the moment. 
󠁿But――)

data.text:
……If you're willing to say that much, 
then I'm looking forward to it, okay!?
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿……If you're willing to say that much, 
󠁿then I'm looking forward to it, okay!?

data.text: (Well……I guess that's fine)
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿(Well……I guess that's fine)

data.text:
Oh no~, I forgot the recyclable trash again…… Ummm, gather up 
all the cardboard, I already threw away the magazines……Ah.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Oh no~, I forgot the recyclable trash again…… Ummm, gather up 
󠁿all the cardboard, I already threw away the magazines……Ah.

data.text: ……I guess I don't need this anymore.
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed: 󠁿……I guess I don't need this anymore.

data.text:
Hishi Miracle gathered up her college pamphlets from her 
bookshelf and tied them together with a string.
data.processed:
󠁿Hishi Miracle gathered up her college pamphlets from her 
󠁿bookshelf and tied them together with a string.

data.text:
Alright. 
Next up…… guess I'll head to training~!
data.name: Hishi Miracle
data.processed:
󠁿Alright. 
󠁿Next up…… guess I'll head to training~!

title: If You Say So, Guess I Should Run
